channel.title: Projects on Adam Oken
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Adam Oken

item.title: Structural Biology
item.description: My lab is conducting strucutral studies for a number of different proteins. We are looking at human mismatch repair proteins MSH2-MSH6, MLH1-PMS2, and the combined structure of MSH2-MSH6 + MLH1-PMS2. Additionally, we are working on the G-protein receptor CB-1.

item.title: Deep Learning
item.description: The applications of machine learning has been rapidly increasing recently. My goal is to apply deep learning to the field of structural biology, specifically to the analysis of cryo-EM images.
